item.title: Binance Delisting Announcement Causes Freefall for 3 Altcoins
item.description: Binance recently announced the delisting of BakeryToken, Hifi Finance, and Self Chain, leading to price drops and important deadlines for users. Stay updated on
item.author: curator@vektr.news (vektr)
